sense.gloss: cutting a person down (without a second thought), sacrificing, throwing to the wolves, treating as sword fodder

sdata.j: もう↑少↑↓すこ↓しやさしく↑意見↑↓いけん↓してあげたらどうなの。↑一刀両断↑↓いっとうりょうだん↓のもと↑切↑↓|き↓り↑捨↑↓す↓て|られた↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑立場↑↓たちば↓も↑考↑↓かんが↓えてよ。
sdata.e: Why don't you try expressing your opinion a little more gently? Think about how he feels getting told flatly that he's being cut loose.
